get_config()

Source: show 

# File test/test_helper.rb, line 24
  def get_config()
    if not defined?(@config_file)
      @config_file = YAML::load_file(File.join(File.dirname(__FILE__), 'test_config.yml'))
    end
    return @config_file
  end
